about_the_game:
Ofuxë the Guardian of Nature is a 3D third-person action-adventure game.

Ofuxë is a bear who lives in the near future, where Earth has been ravaged by increasingly frequent and intense climate storms.
Ultra-modern cities with advanced technologies, but at the cost of destroying nature.
The last wild animals survivors are on the brink of extinction but still captured for cruel scientific experiments run by some mad scientists who have built a secret space station in orbit around the Earth to continue their forbidden experiments there.
Captured and taken to the Horizon spacestation, Ofuxë undergoes cruel experiments and accidentally gets kinetic abilities. He escapes from captivity and sets out to free the other animals, stop the cruel experiments, and restore Nature.

Players control Ofuxë in a series of varied levels, ranging from futuristic cities to forests, mountains, deserts to even a Spacestation.
Ofuxë’s kinetic abilities are used to solve puzzles, manipulate objects, and fight enemies.

Features
  • Travel with Ofuxë through various dystopian maps and levels
  • Use kinetic superpowers to complete quests and fight enemies
  • Free animals from scientists to progress
